DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate text message intervention smoker ' quitline . Smokers either receive 30 week tailor , gain-framed text message 30 week tailor , standard care text message , combine standard quitline treatment . We hypothesize gain-framed text message intervention increase cessation rate 30 week compare standard care text message .
DOC.brief_title: Quit4hlth : Enhancing Tobacco Cancer Control Through Framed Text Messages
DOC.criteria: 1 ) call Quitline request assistance quit smoking , 2 ) 18+ year old , 3 ) speak English , 4 ) verify New York address , 5 ) opt standard Quitline texting protocol .
